response.overview: This story is about four close friends, both good and bad, who face many problems after being used by others. They run away from their hometown to the city, where hardships force them to become thieves. Even though they know it's wrong, they have no other choice. At the same time, few other group is searching for a valuable diamond. One night, the four friends break into a house to stealâ€”only to find the diamond inside. What will happen when they come face to face with the group?
response.title: Karuppiah Perumal
